summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Wacka Accessories e-commerce MVP. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI is working well with minor checkout flow issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Checkout page not accessible when navigating directly to /checkout URL
ui_bugs.details: Users can reach checkout through cart flow but direct URL access fails

passed_tests: All 32 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, categories, and featured products
Products page with search and category filtering
Product detail pages with add to cart functionality
Admin products, inventory, orders, and payments pages accessible
Cart operations - add, update quantity, remove items
M-Pesa payment API integration working (sandbox mode)
No console errors or critical UI issues
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix checkout page direct URL access issue. The checkout flow works when accessed through cart but fails on direct navigation to /checkout URL.
